Own Choice Test Piece Contest
St. George's Hall, Bradford, West Yorkshire, England, UK See http://www.ibew.org.uk/misc4287.htm
19/20 December 1873
Ten bands competed. This first evening resulted in six bands going forward to the second contest on the Saturday
Dec. 8, 2011, 11:11 a.m. May 25, 2014, 8:46 a.m.
